summary: Replaces the magic casting and moving animations with more powerful looking animations of hovering in the air
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a bunch of animations that I've gathered from various mods and put together to make one awesome one.Â This mod Replaces the magic animations but can probably be used with Exclusive animation path. It uses a master spell casting animation combined with a hover mod.

I am aware of one problem which is if you cast while moving backward right/backward left so try to avoid that. It seems unfixable, but you have to try and find it to notice it really.

This is my first mod, thanks to all the modders making these and I hope you all like it (=

I take no credit for the individual animations that make up this mod.

Special Thanks to:
YY Anim Replacer-Mystic Knight by yukl
Hover Animation by 1001001
author: BansheeBloke
